actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the rule providing for termination of disabled adult child's benefits upon marriage.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to repeal provisions for the termination of a disabled adult child's insurance benefit upon his or her marriage.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the rule providing for termination of disabled adult child's benefits upon marriage.
